input.name: species
input.description: A file containing the species type

input.name: nt_sequence
input.description: A FASTA file containing a nucleotide sequence

output.name: subtype
output.description: A file containing the HIV subtype of a sequence

output.name: subtype_data
output.description: A file containing the subtype data of a sequence, this data can be used to get the details of the subtyping process
